access: Characters from Absalom, New Thassilon, Alkenstar, Dongun Hold, or especially technological regions of Arcadia like the Deadshot Lands have access to uncommon clockwork items from the first two chapters of this book. Uomoto  characters,  characters  from  Eihlona, automatons with memories of Jistka, and Arcadians all have access to uncommon magitechnological options from the first two chapters of this book.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Frog Chair](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1162)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Clockwork" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=331" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 91 <sup>2.0</sup>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) All Pathfinder Society agents have access to all uncommon clockwork items and gadgets from Chapters 1 and 2 of this book_

**Price** 475 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 3
</row>

**Access** Characters from Absalom, New Thassilon, Alkenstar, Dongun Hold, or especially technological regions of Arcadia like the Deadshot Lands have access to uncommon clockwork items from the first two chapters of this book. Uomoto  characters,  characters  from  Eihlona, automatons with memories of Jistka, and Arcadians all have access to uncommon magitechnological options from the first two chapters of this book.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This clockwork traveler's chair is shaped like a wheeled frog, with springs attached to the bottom and an extensible tongue on the front.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** You activate the wheelchair's springs to make hopping leaps. For 1 minute, whenever you [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=81) with the wheelchair, you can jump 30 feet in any direction without touching the ground. You must land on a space of solid ground within 30 feet of you, or else you fall after using your next action.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per minute;   **Effect** You activate the wheelchair's tongue to grab a nearby object and bring it to you. Interact to pick up an unattended object within 15 feet and bring it to your empty hand. If you don't have a hand to take the object, it falls in your space instead.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Frog Chair
